PAGE1.TITLE: Let get started
PAGE1.DESCRIPTION: Enter the address that will be the driver's first stop. This can be your address or a friend's address, or any store's address.

PAGE2.TITLE: One more step
PAGE2.DESCRIPTION: Then enter the destination address. If you want the package to reach you, it means that you will have to enter your own address in this section.

PAGE3.TITLE: Tracking
PAGE3.DESCRIPTION: After confirming the fee, calculated depending on the distance, one of our available couriers will deliver the package to its destination. In this process, you will be able to see live where your package is.**
